data.title: The Shadow of Your Smile by Aaron Neville
data.meta_description: The Shadow of Your Smile by Aaron Neville was written by Johnny Mandel and Paul Francis Webster and . Aaron Neville released it on the album Nature Boy - The Standards Album in 2003. It was covered by Larry Vuckovich, Emilie-Claire Barlow, Julian Yeo & His Retro Jazz Band, Rita Reys and other artists.
